title: Colombia Self-Contained Suite Luxury in the Heart of Medellin with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Experience the art of luxury living from the heart of Medellin's exclusive El Poblado neighbourhood at Bluedoors York Luxury Suites. Part of the luxe Preferred Hotels & Resorts collection, this apartment-style hotel was created for the modern traveller who appreciates innovative, intelligent design without having to give up the comforts of home. After a busy day exploring the Colombian city, retreat to your self-contained suite, featuring a full kitchen and plush living area. Shared hotel facilities include a spa, restaurant, state-of-the-art fitness centre and rooftop infinity pool.

El Poblado is widely regarded as the place to stay in Medellin and offers an enticing mix of incredible restaurants, mountainous skyline views and lively streets.

title: Columbia Cultured Andes Mountain City Break with Heated Outdoor Pool, Spa & Three Restaurants
description: Discover South America’s City of Eternal Spring with a stay at InterContinental Medellin, an IHG Hotel. Perched within Colombia's lush hillsides, this retreat offers breathtaking views of the Aburra Valley. Explore the city's rich history at the nearby galleries and museums, savour local cooking onsite at Fogon De Piedra's terrace dining, enjoy fresh Italian at Pepe & Melanzane, or venture out to the bustling El Poblado district, renowned for its trendy boutiques and lively nightlife.
offer_address: Calle 16 Variante #28-51 Las Palmas, Medellin, Antioquia C007-06, Colombia
